pages.text: $(li)Once you have some $(item)Stone$(), mine some more with your $(item)Pickaxe$() and craft all standard $(item)Tools$() from it.  $(br2)Stone tools have low durability and you should switch to iron tools as soon as you can afford them.
Use the $(item)Coal$() you find to smelt food and ores and make $(item)Torches$().  $(br2)$(item)Torches$() and other light prevent monsters from spawning.

$(li)For quick $(item)Food$(), kill some $(thing)Animals$() and cook the meat in a $(l:useables/furnace)$(item)Furnace$() or on $(l:useables/furnace)$(item)Campfire/Firepit$(). $(br)$(li)Try to plant some seeds.
